about_the_game:
Do you like PvP tactical top-down shooters? Bullet Echo is an action shooter. Play an exciting shooting game with multiplayer. Shoot and lead your team to a victory!

Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles, guns and abilities.
Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends!

From the creators of C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars, King of Thieves and Cut the Rope.


- UNIQUE TACTICAL STEALTH ACTION: Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots.
- DESIGNED FOR TEAM PLAY: Start playing with friends online right away! The level of your hero is matched with the highest level in the party.
- MULTIPLE GAME MODES: Team vs Team, Solo and Battle Royale mode with 5 small teams on one map.
- UNLOCK AND UPGRADE NEW HEROES: Each hero has a unique set of abilities. Rank up to boost your hero's power and unlock new perks.
- BE ON TOP: Participate in championships, accomplish missions and receive valuable resources.
- GET REWARDS: Fight to unlock new heroes with unique guns, new perks, maps and game modes!

Official Discord server of the game: https://discord.gg/u4ApPB7

Do you like PvP tactical top-down shooters? Bullet Echo is an action shooter. Play an exciting shooting game with multiplayer. Shoot and lead your team to a victory!

Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles, guns and abilities.
Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends!

From the creators of C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars, King of Thieves and Cut the Rope.


- UNIQUE TACTICAL STEALTH ACTION: Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots.
- DESIGNED FOR TEAM PLAY: Start playing with friends online right away! The level of your hero is matched with the highest level in the party.
- MULTIPLE GAME MODES: Team vs Team, Solo and Battle Royale mode with 5 small teams on one map.
- UNLOCK AND UPGRADE NEW HEROES: Each hero has a unique set of abilities. Rank up to boost your hero's power and unlock new perks.
- BE ON TOP: Participate in championships, accomplish missions and receive valuable resources.
- GET REWARDS: Fight to unlock new heroes with unique guns, new perks, maps and game modes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI™ Radeon™ X700 (256 MB) or NVidia Equivalent (256 MB) or better.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo (3.0 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4870 (1Gb) or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Intel 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel or AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: M1 or Better
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel or AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Bullet Echo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Silver N6005 Processor (4M Cache, up to 3.30 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Tactical shooter. Battle royale, multiplayer. 2d shooting game. Shoot and win!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
